altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

altTitles.es: ¡La Pandilla del Amor Puro de Shonan!

altTitles.th: คู่คนลุยเลอะ!

altTitles.ja: しょうなん じゅんあいぐみ!
湘南純愛組!

description.en: Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma are members of infamous biker gang, Oni Baku. When not out riding around, they can be found in school, trying to pick up young women. This is the story of the young Onizuka, who would later become the greatest teacher in Japan.
description.pt: Antes de Eikichi Onizuka se tornar "Great Teacher Onizuka", ele e Ryuji Danma eram membros da infame gangue de motoqueiros, OniBaku. Quando eles não saem andando por aí se metendo em confusões, esta dupla pode ser encontrada na escola, tentando pegar garotas, claro. Essa é a história de como surgiu a lenda do OniBaku e como era a vida de Onizuka e Ryuji em seu tempo de colegiais.

title.en: The Journey of the Hero and the Wolf

altTitles.hi: एक हीरो और एक भेड़िये की यात्रा

altTitles.ja: 勇者とオオカミの旅

description.en: Together with his faithful wolf, the hero goes on a journey to defeat the Demon King and rescue the Princess. But hardly does he knows…

Novice lyricist Baek Jiseok enters A&R Co. through a recommendation from his college senior and is assigned to compose the lyrics of a new song for renowned singer Cha Doyoon. However, his lyrics are stolen, and he finds himself on the brink of a lawsuit. 
The person who extends a helping hand in this situation to the desperate Jiseok is none other than Cha Doyoon?!
"Why are you helping me?"
Will Jiseok be able to pen his lyrics successfully even as he cohabitates with the unfathomable Doyoon?

altTitles.en: Star in the daytime / Star in daytime
The Star that Rises in the Day

altTitles.ja: 昼間に輝く星

description.en:
Yura Hwang is an actress who only gets to act as an extra for all seven years since she started her career. She got betrayed by her boyfriend that got married to another person. But in all that mess, she met again with the famous senior actor for the second time in her newest movie! Will her path to becoming a star come true?

Original webtoon:
[Official Korean version - Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55452896)
[Official Korean version - Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/stars_rise_day)

[Official Thai Version](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/daytime-star/list?title_no=4349)
description.pl: Yura Hwang, aktorka, która przez siedem lat, odkąd rozpoczęła karierę, występuje tylko jako statystka. Została zdradzona przez swojego chłopaka, który wziął ślub z inną dziewczyną. W całym tym chaosie, udało jej się spotkać ze słynnym aktorem w swoim najnowszym filmie! Czy jej droga do zostania gwiazdą się spełni?

altTitles.en: You’re So Cute What Should I Do

description.en:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

title.en: Outcast Adventurer's Second Chance ~Training in the Fairy World to Forge a Place to Belong~

altTitles.ja: 追放冒険者のやりなおし　～妖精界で鍛えなおして自分の居場所をつくる～
Tsuihou Bokensha no Yarinaoshi ~Yousei-kai de Kitae Naoshite Jibun no Ibasho wo Tsukuru~

description.en: "Glen, your bad reputation is dragging the party down. We're kicking you out today." A party of adventurers formed from childhood friends. The day after a promotion exam, Glen was summoned to the guild and expelled by the party leader. The reason given was the "bad rumours" that followed Glen. The rumours had no basis, but Glen was already considering leaving the party, so he accepted the outcome and left the party. Alone, he returned to his hometown for the first time in a long while to catch up. "Glen, leave this place." What awaited him there were the people who raised him believing in the bad rumours. "If you think I'm like that, then I'll be like that" he shouted as he disappeared into the forest. This is a story about an adventurer trying to regain the things he has lost. Those who abandoned him will wallow in grief, while he moves forward with his new companions.

Although he never wanted to see him again, S Class Esper Seo Leehyeon ends up meeting Jin Taewoo during his Guide matching test. 
In the past, they were each other's closest friend but their relationship fractured and broke due to a peculiar event. 
In an unexpected and unpleasant reunion, Jin Taewoo becomes Seo Leehyeon's exclusive Guide, due to their high compatibility. This guy, who's acting like he's taking revenge for the past, often gets on his nerves, and an aggressive guiding begins...
<< No matter how many times you reject me, you were meant to end up falling into my clutches. >>
Can the Esper really escape from the Guide's revenge?

altTitles.en: I Was Trash, I Am Trash, I Will Be Trash

description.ar: كان يُنظر اليه نظرة استصغار, اجبر على إلغاء خطوبته وتم قتله, ربما هذه هي الحياة التي ينبغي على القمامة عيشها…. ولكن جسده اٌخذ من قبلي, الممارس الاقوى كانغ كون زي. والان بما انني هنا, ساجعل منه الافضل! راقبني بينما استخدم هذا الجسد القمامة الذي املكه لادعس عليهم كالنمل
description.en: He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I'm here, I'll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash body of mine to trample upon you mere ants!
description.fr: Il a été regardé de haut, forcé de rompre ses fiançailles, il a été assassiné, c’est peut-être la vie que les ordures devraient avoir… Mais il a été repris par moi, le cultivateur le plus fort, Cang Kun Zi, quand je suis né à nouveau. Maintenant que je suis là, je vais faire de mon mieux ! Regardez comme j’utilise mon corps pour piétiner de simples fourmis !
description.pt:
Ele era subestimado, foi forçado a terminar seu noivado e foi assassinado. Talvez, esta seja a vida que um inútil mereça…  
No entanto, ele foi tomado por mim, o cultivador mais poderoso, Cang Kun Zi, quando renasci. E agora que estou aqui, superarei as adversidades! Testemunhe enquanto eu uso este meu corpo inócuo para pisar em vocês meras formigas!
description.ru: На него смотрели свысока, заставили разорвать помолвку, а затем убили. Возможно, такая жизнь и должна быть у неудачника… Но его тело стало моим, когда я возродился. Я сильнейший культиватор Цан Куньцзы, и теперь, когда я здесь, я сделаю всё возможное! Вы увидите, как я использую это тело, чтобы топтать вас, муравьи!

description.en: Chen Cheng had an unexpected encounter in Nandu University. She discovered the secret of Wen Jiaqin, a popular actor. It turns out that his persona of a "good little brother" was fake! He is simply a naive and childish person! But, does she now know too much? Is she going to be silenced?

altTitles.en: Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication.

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt: Senhora Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.zh-hk: 古見同學有交流障礙症

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.en: Young Master, Please Don't Show Off

altTitles.pt-br: Jovem Mestre, por favor, não se exiba

description.en: Lin Xiu, a playboy, was reborn in the body of someone in a different world. He could copy others' abilities when he touched them? That's cool! His road to intimate interactions with others started there... "Wait! My sister-in-law, don't beat me! I didn't flirt with other girls. I was doing something serious!"
description.pt-br: Lin Xiu, um playboy, renasceu no corpo de alguém em um mundo diferente. Ele podia copiar as habilidades dos outros quando os tocava? Isso é legal! Seu caminho para interações íntimas com os outros começou ali... "Espere! Minha cunhada, não me bata! Eu não flertei com outras garotas. Eu estava fazendo algo sério!"

altTitles.ja: 魔人―DEVIL

description.en: The creature standing on top of the evolution system aren't human, but a creature named as Majin. Majin Devil is a story about a young nerd who fights against monsters of all sort, and eventually faces Majin who wants to take his body.

altTitles.ja: ダーウィンズゲーム

altTitles.th: ดาร์วินส์ เกม

description.en:
High school student Kaname Sudou receives an invitation from a classmate to play Darwin’s Game, a mobile game he has never heard of. However, as soon as he opens the application, a green snake suddenly pops out from his phone screen and bites his neck, leaving him unconscious. Waking up in the infirmary without any signs of a snake bite, he is told by the school to take the rest of the day off. Although he is puzzled by what has happened, he dismisses the surreal experience as a hallucination and boards the train home.  
Unfortunately, his curiosity gets the better of him and he uses the application once again. As the application appears to be just like any other battle game, Kaname breathes out a sigh of relief and decides to start his first match. However, the pleasant surprise is short-lived, as his in-game opponent unexpectedly appears right in front of him and attempts to hunt him down with a knife.  
As he desperately runs for his life, Kaname puts two and two together and realizes that Darwin’s Game is not an ordinary game, but rather, it’s a brutal fight for survival.

altTitles.ja: 紅椿妃

description.en: Kisshouin Tsubaki aka the "Crimson Camellia" wants to satisfy her occultistic curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find.  Let's follow her in her travels, accompanied by her trusted cameraman Yokomizo-kun.
description.es:
Kisshouin Tsubaki alias la "Camelia Carmesí", una bella reportera de lo oculto, quiere satisfacer su curiosidad intelectual teniendo una experiencia práctica con cada Yokai que pueda encontrar.  
Sígala en sus viajes, acompañada por su confiable camarógrafo Yokomizo-kun.

altTitles.ja: キメツ学園!

altTitles.th: โรงเรียนดาบพิฆาตอสูร!

description.en: This spin-off series initially started off as short comedic segments included at the end of Demon Slayer chapters. Illustrated by Gotoge, the modern “school life” parody features popular Demon Slayer characters as high school students and various Hashira as the academy’s teachers.

title.en: Kimetsu No Yaiba Kimetsu Gakuen! Complete Focus Drill

altTitles.vi: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Luyện tập tập trung toàn phần: Phiên bản của các Hơi thở – Manga Extra!

altTitles.ja: 鬼滅の刃 キメツ学園! 全集中ドリル

description.en: Specially drawn manga by Natsuki Hokami in Official study book of "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba" and "Kimetsu Gakuen!" "Total Focus Drill" is a learning book series in which nine of the highest-ranking swordsmen, the "pillars" of the Demon Slayer Corps, teach you about your own breathing!  By all means, you should get your hands on a book that you can enjoy learning with "full concentration" from children to adults!

title.en: Attouteki Gacha Un de Isekai wo Nariagaru!

altTitles.id: Bangun di dunia yang berbeda dengan keberuntungan gacha yang luar biasa!

altTitles.en: Creating a Better Life in Another World by Winning Gachas with my Overwhelming Luck!

altTitles.ja: 圧倒的ガチャ運で異世界を成り上がる！

altTitles.en: I Rose Suddenly In The Alternate World By Overwhelming Gacha With Luck!

description.en:
Overworked Salaryman Jinta dies in a traffic accident and meets the Goddess Leafa. Due to Jinta's good karma he was supposed to be sent to Heaven, but during an argument the two of them were accidentally reincarnated to another world, much to Jinta's delight.

Discovering that his Luck stat has gone beyond the maximum of 99 to 999999, Jinta plans to live his life to fullest by taking advantage of the Gacha system that this world runs on.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: スワン 白鳥
芭蕾群英

description.en:
The dreams and passions of dancers for all ballet and manga fans. A masterpiece of ballet manga, depicting a girl who, while troubled and hurt, blossoms her unfathomable talent! 

A high quality volume long-awaited by fans, it includes color pages and chapter covers from the serialization, as well as newly-drawn manga showing what happened to the main character.

title.en: My father has become a beautiful girl and it's a lot of pain

altTitles.ja: 父親が美少女になってしまって色々つらい

altTitles.ja-ro: Chichi oya ga bishōjo ni natte shimatte iroiro tsurai

description.en:
a Successful Annoying Father got TS become a Beautiful Girl now has lost a job 
Have to be depending on the son and slowly start anew

Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

Have you ever noticed that someone you knew is no longer themselves? The subtle changes they show that indicate that they are no longer… human? Join hunters Ha-Te, Sul-bak and their part-time partner Ji-Hyun Kang on their adventure of hunting trolls to save humanity!

altTitles.en: No Dating Allowed in the Office
I Refuse to Have a Love Affair!

description.en:
Is first love a big deal? If we met that first love as adults, would we really still feel the butterflies? With a first love who is a friend who is also a co-worker, beyond this reversely developed relationship is the true belief of "No to Office Romance!"

Namsoo of <Romance 101> meets Dooboo of <One-of-a-Kind Romance>! Masters of romance fusing up to deliver this romantic comedy!

A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
description.pt: A história se passa em um colégio católico, onde a doce e gentil Song Ayeon, passa seus dias de tormento sofrendo Bullyng dia após dia, até que um "anjo" Baek Yeinhwa à salva com suas "boas" intenções, mas por trás dessa bondade toda ela têm seus motivos pra salvar a pobre donzela das garras…

altTitles.th: อองกอร์ ล่าบันทึกวีรบุรุษสุดขอบโลก

altTitles.ja: 世界の終わりの世界録

description.en:
The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now!  
  


---
description.fr:
À la fin de la Guerre de la Fin, le Héros vaillant, Elline, laissa derrière lui un trésor inestimable, l’Encore, archive contenant tout de ce monde, de sa création à sa réincarnation. Les pays du monde envoyèrent des équipes d’aventuriers à la recherche de l’Encore, et formèrent la jeunesse pour leur futur. Ren E. Maxwell, un épéiste en devenir sans talent, est moqué par tous ces camarades : copie conforme d’Elline, il est appelé le Faux héros vaillant. Un jour cependant, il fit la rencontre de Kylse, ancienne équipière d’Elline. Celle-ci le confond alors avec Elline… La légende du Faux héros vaillant commence ici!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/sazanek)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/usuiryu)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Author’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2241184)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Manga Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/873046)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://mfbunkoj.jp/special/sekai/)  
- [Alternative Raw](https://comic-alive.jp/product/sekai/)
description.pt: O valioso tesouro, o "Encore", que foi deixado pelo lendário Bravo Herói, Elline, tem a gravação do fim do mundo e a reencarnação do mundo. Os países e as brigadas (partes) em todo o mundo estão buscando a localização do seu paradeiro; a era de lutas pelo Encore. O garoto chamado Ren que quer se tornar um cavaleiro, mas não tem talento empunhando espadas, apesar de procurar ser exatamente como o Elline the Brave Hero, ele tem tido um estilo de vida onde as pessoas zombam dele como o "Falso Bravo Herói". O que aparece na frente dele é a lendária Princesa Dragão Krische, que tinha acordado de seu selamento. Ela confunde Ren com Elline, embora ela fica decepcionada, pois ele simplesmente parece com ele, mas ela mais tarde descobre um potencial oculto nele. E ela o convida para a viagem para encontrar o Encore, juntamente com a Arcanja Phia e a Lorde Demônio Elise que salvaram o mundo antes. "Você quer vir conosco?." - Este é o prelúdio de excitação selvagem desempenhado pelos heróis. O garoto conhecido como o falso com seu caminho cruzado com a lenda Bravo Herói começa agora!
description.pt-br: O valioso tesouro, o “Encore”, deixado pelo lendário Bravo Herói, Elline, tem a gravação do fim do mundo e a reencarnação do mundo. Os países e os grupos de aventureiros em todo o mundo, estão buscando sua localização. O garoto chamado Ren que quer se tornar um cavaleiro, mas não tem talento empunhando espadas, apesar de procurar ser exatamente como o Elline o Bravo Herói, ele tem sido menosprezado pelas pessoas que o chamam de “Falso Bravo Herói”. Quem aparece na frente dele é a lendária Princesa dos Dragões, Kyelse, que acordou de seu selamento. Ela confunde Ren com Elline, embora fique decepcionada, pois ele é simplesmente alguém parecido ao seu falecido companheiro, mais tarde um potencial oculto é descoberto nele, então ela o convida para uma viagem em busca do Encore, com a Arcanjo, Fear e a Lorde Demônio, Elise, que salvaram o mundo anteriormente. “Você quer vir conosco?.” – Este é o prelúdio de excitação selvagem desempenhado pelos heróis. O garoto conhecido como uma cópia barata tem seu caminho cruzado com a lenda do Bravo Herói! 68 Visualizações totais, 68 Visualizações hoje

description.en:
Joo Yeomin is a hardworking college student that works day and night. He's also becoming an expert at running away from the loan sharks...

'Huh... Didn't I see that person yesterday?'

One day, a suspicious man keeps showing up at Yeomin's part-time jobs.

"We know each other, right?"

"No, we don't! Why do you keep following me?"

What possibilities could come of the chase between the part-timer and the suspicious Chaebol?

title.en: A Story About a Hallucinatory Girl

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう話

altTitles.vi: Cô gái trong ảo giác của tôi

description.en:
Alternate Official Raw:
* [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

altTitles.ja: アークナイツ OPERATORS!

description.en:
The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!
description.pt-br: A história segue os membros do grupo Rhodes Island, um grupo criado com o propósito de proteger e ajudar pessoas infectadas com Oripatia. Acompanhe o dia a dia deles enquanto fazem seu trabalho.

altTitles.ja: 魔女は満月に咲く

altTitles.en: Witch Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

title.en: The Story of My Friend's Big Sister Aiming At Me?

altTitles.ja: 友達の姉ちゃんに狙われてしまった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomodachi no Nee-chan ni Nerawarete Shimatta Hanashi

description.en:
Kouhei is a highschool student. His friend, Yuudai has a big sister, who is rumored to be a total slut, stealing someone's boyfriends and sleeping with anyone.

But Kouhei finds out that she's....

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Please Act Like a Boss Monster, Mr. Swallow!

altTitles.ru: Ведите себя как подобает боссу подземелья, господин Сваллоу!

altTitles.en: The Unbeatable Dungeon's Lazy Boss Monster
Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss

description.en:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

title.en: My Job is Appraiser, but What is The [God Eye]? Living Freely with The World's Greatest Elementary Level Job

altTitles.ja: 職業は鑑定士ですが【神眼】ってなんですか？　～世界最高の初級職で自由にいきたい～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shokugyou wa Kanteishi Desu ga [Shingan] tte Nandesu ka? ~ Sekai Saikou no Shokyuushoku de Jiyuu ni Ikitai ~ ​

description.en:
Touri, a High schooler who was Transported to another World, was immediately banished due to his Elementary Level Job, 'Appraiser'.
But there's more to his Job...!? The Curtains of the Other World Fantasy  Survival using Appraiser Skill Opens!

title.en: Tsugi wa Anata ga Yarareru Ban Death.

altTitles.ja: 次はアナタがヤられる番です。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi wa Anata ga Yarareru Ban desu.

altTitles.es-la: Ahora es tu turno de ser derrotado.

altTitles.en: Next, it's Your Turn to be Killed

description.en:
The normal high school life came to an abrupt end when an armed group invaded. The students are toyed with by men who control the high school with firearms in their hands. An orgy of sex and death unfolds there. What awaits beyond that... Erotic suspense horror begins.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64650)
description.ja:
当たり前の高校生活は武装した集団が侵入してきたことによって唐突に終わりを告げた。銃器を手にし高校を支配した男たちに生徒たちは弄ばれる。そこに展開される性と死の狂宴。その先に待つものは――。エロティックサスペンスホラー、開幕。

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64650)
description.es-la: Una vida normal en la secundaria pero llegó a un abrupto final cuando un grupo armado invadió. Los hombres armados que gobiernan la escuela secundaria juegan con los estudiantes. Allí se desarrolla una fiesta de sexo y muerte.

altTitles.ja: 僕の呪いの吸血姫

description.en: In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.
description.ja: 人間を喰い殺す「吸血鬼」が出現し、猛威を振るうようになった日本。特殊部隊の隊長・緒坂唯鈴は、吸血鬼から仲間を守りたい一心で国が非公式に拘束しているという「吸血鬼バロック」の誘拐を計画。あまりの美しさゆえ、見た者を狂い死なせるという伝説の「吸血鬼殺し」バロック。自らの立場も命も投げうち、彼女に協力を求める唯鈴にバロックは――。

altTitles.ja: 地縛少年 花子くん
地缚少年花子君

altTitles.pt-br: Hanako-Kun e os mistérios do colégio Kamome

altTitles.es-la: Hanako-kun y los Misterios de la Academia Kamome

altTitles.th: ฮานาโกะคุง วิญญาณติดที่

description.en:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san… are you there?"  
At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom… but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san… is a boy!  
  
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Hanako si Arwah Penasaran** (2019)
- Korean release by 루트미디어 as **지박소년 하나코군** (2019)
- Polish release by Studio JG as **Hanako : duch ze szkolnej toalety**
- Turkish release by Gerekli Şeyler Yayıncılık as **Tuvalet Hayaleti Hanako-Kun** (2022)
description.id:
Ada rumor tentang tujuh misteri atau lebih dikenal dengan "Nana Fushigi" di Akademi Kamome. Salah satunya adalah “Hanako”, hantu yang menghuni toilet wanita bilik ketiga di lantai 3 gedung sekolah lama. Konon, dia akan mengabulkan apa pun harapan orang yang memanggilnya. Di sisi lain, Nene Yashiro, seorang siswi SMA, melibatkan dirinya dengan makhluk supernatural agar harapannya terkabul. Inilah kisah komedi yang menghangatkan hati tentang Hanako, si hantu toilet, dengan gadis penggemar misteri!

(Sumber: Sinopsis resmi)
description.it: Hanako, una sorta di spiritello noto come uno dei 7 misteri dell'Accademia Kamone, occupa il terzo bagno nei sanitari femminili al terzo piano, nel vecchio palazzo della scuola, e può avverare qualsiasi desiderio quando viene invocato. Un giorno come tanti, Nene Yashiro, una grande amante dell'occulto che sogna il grande amore, s'imbatte in Hanako ma viene colta dalla sorpresa quando scopre che Hanako è proprio un ragazzo! Nene diventa la sua assistente facendo così iniziare le loro avventure tra le varie leggende metropolitane che popolano la scuola.
description.ru:
«Ханако-сан, Ханако-сан… ты там?»  
В академии Камомэ, как и во многих других японских школах существуют «семь школьных тайн», одна из которых легенда о Ханако-сан. Говорят, что если в женском туалете на третьем этаже постучать в третью кабинку, появится Ханако-сан, которая исполнит любое твоё желание…  
Ясиро Нэнэ — обычная школьница, любящая жуткие истории, отправляется в женский туалет, чтобы призвать Ханако-сан и исполнить своё романтическое желание. Но, как оказалось, в академии Камомэ Ханако-сан — это… мальчик.
description.th: มีข่าวลือน่าพิศวงเกี่ยวกับสิ่งลี้ลับทั้งเจ็ดที่เล่าต่อกันมาในโรงเรียนคาโมเมะ ว่ากันว่าในห้องน้ำหญิงห้องที่สามชั้นที่สามของตึกเรียนเก่ามี "คุณฮานาโกะ" ที่จะช่วยให้คำขอร้องของผู้ที่เรียกตนออกมาสมหวังไม่ว่าจะเป็นเรื่องใดก็ตาม เนเนะ ยาชิโระ ผู้ที่มีความปรารถนาว่าอยากจะใจตรงกันกับคนที่ชอบ ก็ได้ลองเข้าไปในห้องน้ำหญิงแล้วลองเรียก "คุณฮานาโกะ คุณฮานาโกะ อยู่หรือเปล่าคะ" ตอนนั้นเองคุณฮานาโกะก็ได้ปรากฏตัวออกมาจริง ๆ ทว่า คุณฮานาโกะคนนั้นกลับเป็นเด็กผู้ชายซะงั้น!
description.es-la:
"Hanako, Hanako... ¿estás ahí?"
En la Academia Kamome, abundan los rumores sobre los Siete Misterios de la escuela, uno de los cuales es Hanako. Se dice que ocupa el tercer puesto del baño de niñas del tercer piso en el antiguo edificio de la escuela, Hanako concede cualquier deseo cuando es convocado. Nene Yashiro, una chica de escuela secundaria que adora el ocultismo que sueña con el romance, se aventura en este baño embrujado, pero el Hanako que conoce no es nada como ella se imaginaba. ¡Hanako de la academia Kamome en realidad es un niño!

altTitles.ja: 復讐チャンネル ウラミン ～公開処刑ナマ配信中～

description.en:
The online video site "Uramin TV" is a popular channel that distributes videos depicting punishment on harmful people and has over 3 million subscribers. 
Minori Yoshiura, also known as "Uramin", who runs this site, has enthusiastic followers, but in fact, she was bullied horribly when she was in elementary school and became a shut-in. She vows to take revenge on her bullying perpetrators and broadcasts her revenge videos live. The number one target is Takemura Kyouka, the ringleader of bullying who has pushed her to the depths of hell and is now living a carefree life!

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

title.en: Satsuriku no Kuindeddo – 7-nin no Onna Shikeishuu

altTitles.ja: Satsuriku no Queen Dead – Nananin no Onna Shikeishuu
殺戮のクインデッド -7人の女死刑囚-

description.en: Deep Palace is a prison island that houses only death row inmates. A young girl, Akari, was kept in the "Deep Palace" for a certain purpose... One day, the death row inmates suddenly start killing each other! A battle royale called the “Killing” is taking place where prisoners can do whatever they want as they remain the last ones standing! In the face of this pandemonium, will Akari be able to safely survive the "Killing" and escape from the prison?!

title.en: Kimi to Sekai ga Owaru Hi ni

altTitles.en: Love You as the World Ends

altTitles.ja: 君と世界が終わる日に

description.en: On the day of his proposal, Hibiki Mamiya, a young man, is trapped in a tunnel collapse accident. When he narrowly escapes from the tunnel, the world has completely changed. A dilapidated cityscape, countless bodies, and the "living dead" wandering around the city... Amidst this abnormal situation, Hibiki desperately searches for his lover, but he is nowhere to be found. Will the few survivors survive together in this hopeless situation? The manga is based on the television drama, "Love You as the World Ends".

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

altTitles.ja: サンダー3

description.en: A trio of teenage boys taken straight from a classic retro-looking gag manga jump through dimensions to a hyper realistic modern sci-fi world Gantz-style in order to save one of the boy's little sister.

altTitles.ja: インゴシマ

description.en: The Yoshinomiya Municipal High School 2nd year students embarked on what they'd hoped was an educational trip with their friends and away from family but it was not meant to be… Their ship was hit by unexpected rough seas and crashed on a strange island! The surviving students are trying to understand what happened but soon they realize they are not alone on this island and the locals don't appear to be very friendly to strangers!!!
description.es-la: Los estudiantes de 2º de Bachillerato Municipal de Yoshinomiya se embarcaron en lo que esperaban que fuera un viaje educativo con sus amigos y lejos de la familia, pero no estaba destinado a ser así... ¡Su barco fue golpeado por un inesperado oleaje y se estrelló en una extraña isla! Los estudiantes supervivientes intentan entender lo que ha pasado pero pronto se dan cuenta de que no están solos en esta isla y ¡¡¡los lugareños no parecen ser muy amables con los extraños!!!

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Small Town hardship in Sengoku Era - An Agriculture Comic

altTitles.ja: 戦国小町苦労譚 農耕戯画

altTitles.zh: 战国小町苦劳谭-农耕戏画

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés d'un village à l'époque Sengoku - Une histoire agricole

description.en:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)  
Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
description.fr: Shizuko est une lycéenne ordinaire avec des intérêts extraordinaires : l'Histoire et l'agricutlure. Ces passions vont peut-être lui sauver la vie : projetée à la période Sengoku, elle se retrouve au service d'un seigneur excentrique et exigeant : le fameux Oda Nobunaga. Obsédé par l'idée d'unifier le pays en proie aux guerres intestines, il entend bien faire usage des étranges compétences de cette fille venue d'ailleurs. Shizuko parviendra-t-elle à gagner sa confiance ? Retournera-t-elle à son époque ?

title.en: Rise of the Kowtowing Girl ~Sacrificial Revenge Game~

altTitles.ja: 土下座少女の下剋上 ～生贄リベンジゲーム～

altTitles.en: The Ascendance of the Dogeza Girl ~Sacrifice Revenge Game~

description.en: In a mysterious school, there is a class where students with the lowest grades are sent, named the "isolated class". Akari, an ordinary female student, falls into the "isolated class" due to her friend's betrayal, where she is exposed to irrational senseless violence! However, she stands up to the members who dominate the class with an unyielding heart. At the same time, Akari joins forces with Yuto, another student who has fallen into the segregated class, and vows to climb out of this mess...

title.en: Konbini Baito no Gal ga Kininaru Kyaku to Chikazuku Hanashi

altTitles.ja-ro: Konbini Baito no Gyaru ga Kininaru Kyaku to Chikazuku Hanashi

altTitles.ja: コンビニバイトのギャルが気になる客と近づく話
コンビニではじまる恋の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Konbini de Hajimaru Koi no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Gyaru Working at a Convenience Store Who Gets Closer to a Customer She's Interested in
A Story About a Burgeoning Love at a Convenience Store

altTitles.ru: История о гяру-продавщице, сблизившейся с покупателем

altTitles.es-la: Harén del Fin del Mundo - Fantasía

altTitles.ja: 終末のハーレム ファンタジア

description.en: It's year 998, and the world has been corrupted by darkness. The next head of the small border kingdom of Nagara, Ark, has feelings for his cousin, Aurelia, but a political marriage to the Crown Prince has separated them. In order to get her back, Ark desires immense power, but a mysterious dark elf, Rati, appears in front of him.  In exchange for a promise, she will give him "the power to rule the world." An erotic and dark fantasy begins!
description.ja: 聖暦998年。そこはまもなく終末を迎える闇に蝕まれた世界。辺境の小国ナーガラの次期当主・アルクは従姉のアウレリアと両想いだったが、皇太子との政略結婚のため引き離されてしまった。彼女を取り戻そうと強力な力を欲するアルクの前に現れた謎のダークエルフ・ラティ。ラティからある約束と引き換えに“この世を統べることができる力”を授けると告げられたアルクは――。エロティック＆ダークファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Es el año 998, y el mundo ha sido corrompido por la oscuridad. El próximo jefe del pequeño reino fronterizo de Nagara, Alk, siente algo por su prima Aurelia, pero un matrimonio político con el príncipe heredero los ha separado. Para recuperarla, Alk anhela un inmenso poder, pero la misteriosa elfa oscura Rati aparece ante él.  A cambio de una promesa, ella le dará "el poder de gobernar el mundo". ¡Comienza una fantasía erótica y oscura!

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!
